input.sentences: i met up with [female] who wanted to do a pre-photo shoot before her wedding .
she was a lot of fun to photograph .
she looked really great in her wedding gown .
she also wanted to pose in some options of bridesmade dresses .
she really enjoyed the red one and choose it for her wedding .
output.sentences: Sarah got to enjoy a pre-wedding wedding dress photo shoot.
You can tell by this photograph she had a lot of fun and she didn't want it to end so the shoot went into OT.
The reason for the shoot was to pick the wedding gown she looked the best in.
I love this pose but these types of shots don't show the dresses leaving you with zero options to pick from.
Though Sara won't we wearing this red dress for her wedding she throughly enjoyed posing with it.
